attacks.name: Fire Fang
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.

abilities.name: Burning Fighter
abilities.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may discard the top 5 cards of your deck. If any of those cards are Fire Energy cards, attach them to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Flamethrower
attacks.text: Discard an Energy from this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Resolute Flame
abilities.text: This Pokémon's attacks do 30 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon for each of their Pokémon-GX and Pokémon-EX in play.

attacks.text: Discard an Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Singe
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.

abilities.name: Natural Cure
abilities.text: Whenever you attach an Energy card from your hand to this Pokémon, remove all Special Conditions from it.

attacks.name: Lunge
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

abilities.name: Firestarter
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may attach a Fire Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Fire Stream
attacks.text: Discard a Fire Energy from this Pokémon. This attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Infinity
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage for each basic Energy card in your discard pile. Then, shuffle those cards into your deck.

attacks.name: Damage Rush
attacks.text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 30 more damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Heat Assist
attacks.text: Attach up to 3 Fire Energy cards from your hand to your Pokémon in any way you like.

attacks.text: You may attach up to 5 Fire Energy cards from your hand to your Pokémon in any way you like. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Fury Swipes
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage for each heads.

attacks.text: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck.

abilities.name: Downpour
abilities.text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a Water Energy card from your hand.

attacks.name: Riptide
attacks.text: This attack does 20 more damage for each Water Energy card in your discard pile. Then, shuffle those cards into your deck.

abilities.name: Wash Out
abilities.text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move a Water Energy from 1 of your Benched Pokémon to your Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Hydro Pump
attacks.text: This attack does 20 more damage times the amount of Water Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Bubble Shoot
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage times the amount of Water Energy attached to this Pokémon to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

abilities.name: Submerge
abilities.text: As long as this Pokémon is on your Bench, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks (both yours and your opponent's).

attacks.name: Aurora Wave
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Aqua Split
attacks.text: This attack does 40 damage to 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

abilities.name: Murmurs of the Sea
abilities.text: Your Water Pokémon can't be Confused. If those Pokémon are already Confused, remove that Special Condition.

attacks.name: Water Pulse
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

abilities.name: Meet Up
abilities.text: Your Wishiwashi-GX in play get +20 HP, and their attacks do 20 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Mini Earthquake
attacks.text: This attack does 10 damage to each of your Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

abilities.name: Weed Out
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may choose 3 of your Benched Pokémon. Then, discard your other Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Dark Destruction
attacks.text: You may discard an Energy from this Pokémon. If you do, discard an Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.text: This Pokémon can't attack during your next turn.

attacks.name: Dragonporter-GX
attacks.text: Put 3 Dragon Pokémon from your discard pile onto your Bench. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Sonic Edge
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

abilities.name: Dragon Guard
abilities.text: Prevent all effects of your opponent's attacks, except damage, done to your Dragon Pokémon. (Existing effects are not removed.)

attacks.name: Sand Tomb
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

abilities.name: Fight Song

name: Blaine's Last Stand
rules: You can play this card only when it is the last card in your hand.Draw 2 cards for each Fire Pokémon you have in play.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Dragon Talon
rules: If the Dragon Pokémon this card is attached to is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if that Pokémon is Knocked Out), put 3 damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon.

name: Fiery Flint
rules: You can play this card only if you discard 2 other cards from your hand.Search your deck for up to 4 Fire Energy cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Lance Prism Star
rules: You can play this card only if 1 of your Pokémon was Knocked Out during your opponent's last turn.Search your deck for up to 2 Dragon Pokémon and put them onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Switch Raft
rules: Switch your Active Water Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon. If you do, heal 30 damage from the Pokémon you moved to your Bench.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Wela Volcano Park
rules: Whenever a player flips a coin for the Special Condition Burned between turns, that Special Condition isn't removed even if the result is heads.
You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

name: Zinnia
rules: You can play this card only if 1 of your Pokémon was Knocked Out during your opponent's last turn.Attach up to 2 basic Energy cards from your hand to 1 of your Dragon Pokémon.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.
